title: Fix Google Map location and polish the Contact map section UI

requirements.text: Fix the Google Maps embed so it reliably points to the exact Rajdhani Beej Bhandar location using ONLY the provided location link (https://maps.app.goo.gl/1nXnfAyBe6BFAnA87), and ensure both the embedded map and the "Open in Google Maps" button open the same correct location (no wrong pin).

quotes: Fix map location and make it more professional and stylish

acceptanceCriteria: CONTACT_INFO.googleMapsEmbedUrl is updated to a valid Google Maps embed URL that shows the correct Rajdhani Beej Bhandar location (not a placeholder/incorrect coordinates).
On the Contact page, the iframe renders the correct location and the "Open in Google Maps" button opens the same correct location in a new tab.
If the embed fails to load (blocked/invalid), the Contact page remains stable and usable (no crash), and the user still has a working "Open in Google Maps" link.

requirements.text: Make the Contact page map/location section look more professional and stylish while staying lightweight (no heavy animations), improving spacing, card treatment, and map frame presentation without changing the core content.

quotes: Fix map location and make it more professional and stylish

acceptanceCriteria: The map section on frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx has improved visual polish (e.g., refined Card styling, better padding/typography hierarchy, tasteful border/shadow, consistent rounding) while remaining fast to render.
The map iframe is presented in a cleaner frame (consistent rounded corners, subtle border/shadow) and maintains a responsive aspect ratio.
User-facing text remains in English (existing i18n keys continue to be used; no new hardcoded non-English strings are introduced).
No new heavy animation libraries/components are added; any motion is limited to subtle hover/focus states consistent with the existing Tailwind/shadcn styling.

constraints: Use ONLY this provided Google Maps location link as the canonical location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/1nXnfAyBe6BFAnA87.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep changes lightweight and non-crashing; embed failures must not break page rendering.
nonGoals: Adding a new map provider (e.g., Mapbox) or any geolocation features.
Implementing real-time directions, route planning, or location search.
Backend changes (no Motoko changes required for this task).
